functional.description: The system must allow authorized users to register basic trainee information (Name, Sex, Designation, Organization, Mobile No, Email, NID, etc.).
functional.module: Basic Information Registration System of Trainee

functional.description: The system must allow Super Admin to create training courses (Course Title, Description, Duration, etc.).
The system must allow authorized users to register basic trainer information (Name, Sex, Designation, Organization, Subject Specialization, Mobile No, Email, NID, etc.).
functional.module: Basic Information Registration System of Trainer

functional.description: The system must allow authorized users to enroll trainees in courses.
The system must provide a dashboard for authorized users to view summarized information and ongoing status.
The system must allow Admin users to create and manage users (Head Office, District, Upazilla) with role-based permissions.
The system must send email notifications to trainees when nominated for training or when information is updated.
The system must allow authorized users to generate reports (Trainee List, Trainer List, Attendance Sheet, Customized Reports).
The system must support Bengali Unicode for displaying content in both English and Bengali languages.

nonFunctional.description: The system must ensure access control and application-level security.
The system must implement role-based credential management.
The system must encrypt user IDs and passwords, enforce minimum password length, and allow password resets.
The system must provide a dynamic dashboard with table and graphic reports.
The system must support periodic and instant data backup with auto-archiving.
The system must be cross-browser compatible, responsive, and visually appealing.
The system must support Bengali Unicode for content display.
The system must undergo module, integration, and load testing with security validation.
The system must use open-source technologies (PHP, Bootstrap, Laravel/CakePHP, MySQL).
The system must provide 24x7 technical support with incident categorization and escalation.
